title: Kitāb-i chahār maqālah / taʼlīf-i Aḥmad ibn ʻUmar ibn ʻAlī al-Niẓamī al-ʻArūz̤ī al-Samarqandī ; bi-saʻī va ihtimām va taṣḥīḥ-i Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Wahhāb Qazvīnī.
author: Niẓāmī. ʻArūz̤ī, fl. 1110-1161.

title: Iqbāl va shiʻr-i Fārsī / khaṭābah-i Muḥammad ʻAlī Dāʻī al-Islām.
author: Ḥasanī Dāʻī al-Islāmī, Muḥammad ʻAlī.
